Package org.neo4j.dbms.database

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DatabaseContext  
    DatabaseManager<DB extends DatabaseContext>  
    DatabaseOperationCounts
    This interface and it's embedded implementation is there to track database operation in Enterprise Editions via Global Metrics.
    SystemGraphComponent
    The system database is used to store information of interest to many parts of the DBMS.
    TransactionLogVersionProvider  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDatabaseManager<DB extends DatabaseContext>  
    AbstractSystemGraphComponent
    Common code for all system graph components, apart from test implementations and the central collection class SystemGraphComponents.
    DatabaseConfig  
    DatabaseManagementServiceImpl  
    DatabaseOperationCounts.Counter  
    DatabasePageCache
    Wrapper around global page cache for an individual database.
    DatabasePageCache.DatabasePageFile  
    DbmsRuntimeRepository  
    DbmsRuntimeSystemGraphComponent  
    DefaultDatabaseInitializer
    Run after SystemGraphInitializer but before registering extensions
    DefaultDatabaseManager  
    DefaultSystemGraphComponent
    This is the community component for databases.
    DefaultSystemGraphInitializer  
    StandaloneDatabaseContext  
    StandaloneDbmsRuntimeRepository
    A version of DbmsRuntimeRepository for standalone editions.
    SystemGraphComponents
    Central collection for managing multiple versioned system graph initializers.
    SystemGraphDbmsModel  
    SystemGraphInitializer  
    TransactionLogVersionProviderImpl
